Claim: "The basketball player in red is challenging the player in white for the ball."
Referring expressions: The basketball player in red, player in white, ball.  People, basketball
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsInRed(a) and IsChallenging(a,b) and HasBall(a))) & (forall f (forall g ( IsInRed(f) ->  IsPlayingBasketball(g)))) & (forall i (forall h (  HasBall(h) ->  IsPlayingBasketball(i))))) -> (exists d (IsPlayingBasketball(d)))
